scenario_text.value: Wow... The area deepest inside the shrine...
Takuma! Look!

It’s Miyuki. Renamon, everyone, look!
Miyuki’s over there!
Miyuki... Miyuki!
Are we safe here? What about what’s-his-face?

We’re here to rescue you, Miyuki. You’re safe
now.

So you think you’re going to take back my
little priestess... Idiots.
Argh...!

We’re too late! The Master has taken over her
mind!
Miyuki... Sis! Pull yourself together!
You aren’t the type to let the Master win!

Don’t be silly... My little priestess’s mind
has already been completely overwritten.
You’ll never see your friend agai—AGH!

What’s going on...? She’s in pain all of
a sudden!

This happened before, right? She was still in
there somewhere.
So it’s the same thing again!
Miyuki... I mean, Sis! It’s me, Haru!

We can finally be together again. I’m begging
you, please listen!
Who is...calling me? That voice...

Ergh! Why?! Her mind should’ve been destroyed
by my darkness!
Miyuki! Don’t let the Master take control!
Miyuki!

No, she is my doll, my priestess... You can’t
have her!
Assemble, my loyal followers!
Grrraaahhhh!
Yikes, where’d these guys come from?!
Damn, there’s a lot of them!
But retreat is not an option!
Wait! Something seems off!
Grrr... Hissss...
Takuma! They’re surrounding Miyuki!
Hey! What are you doing to her?!
I need a stronger body to serve as my vessel.
What?! No...

Give me your strength! Merge with the body of
my priestess!
Kishaaahhh!
What’s happening?!
This can’t be! They’re fusing into her body!
NOOO! Stop it! Stop it! Get away from her!
Ngh! Hehehe... So much power... YES!
No, not my sister...!

(His followers have taken over her body...
This is insanity!)

Hahaha... Thank you so much for getting in my
way.

Now I will take all of your stupid little
lives.
Look out, Takuma!

(Ugh! We don’t have time to figure out what’s
going on!)
Time to fight back, Agumon!
